name: Shrek: Ogres and Dronkeys
description: Your ogre and dronkey are ready for an adventure! Take them out into Shrek’s fun and exciting fairytale land. Explore Shrek’s swamp, the candy-filled world of Gingyland, Dragon’s Castle and more with your favorite Shrek characters. Shrek, Donkey, Fiona and all of your fairytale favorites lend a hand to help you raise the ogres and dronkeys. Use the skills you teach them to solve wacky puzzles and overcome challenges on the adventure of their lives! Discover cool new toys on your journey into exciting new lands!
